description: The head of the Kamisato Clan, Ayato is a Hydro sword user who excels at rapid attacks and AoE Hydro application.

artifacts.name: Echoes of an Offering (2) + Heart of Depth (2)

info: Ayato is a Hydro DPS who excels at rapid Normal Attacks and AoE Hydro application. Build him for CRIT, Hydro DMG, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kamisato Art - Marobashi
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a flurry of sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Kamisato Art: Kyouka
skills.desc: Ayato shifts positions and enters the Takimeguri Kanka state, unleashing rapid Hydro attacks.
skills.details_html:
Kamisato Art: Kyouka
Shifts positions and enters the Takimeguri Kanka state, unleashing rapid Hydro attacks that scale with Ayato's Max HP.

skills.name: Kamisato Art: Suiyuu
skills.desc: Ayato creates a garden of purity that increases Normal Attack DMG of characters inside and deals continuous Hydro DMG to enemies.
skills.details_html:
Kamisato Art: Suiyuu
Creates a garden of purity that increases Normal Attack DMG of characters inside and deals continuous Hydro DMG to enemies. Lasts for 18s.

passive_talents.name: Kamisato Art: Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
passive_talents.desc: Ayato gains 2 Namisen stacks after using Kyouka.

passive_talents.name: Kamisato Art: Michiyuku Hagetsu
passive_talents.desc: When Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he regenerates 2 Energy every second.

passive_talents.name: Kamisato Art: Daily Cooking
passive_talents.desc: When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, he has an 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Kyouka Fuushi
constellations.desc: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

constellations.name: World Source
constellations.desc: Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5.

constellations.name: To Admire the Flowers
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Kyouka by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc: Opponents within Suiyuu's field take 20% increased DMG.

constellations.name: Endless Flow
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Suiyuu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Boundless Origin
constellations.desc: After using Kyouka, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack creates 2 extra slashes, each dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
